lines.text:
[final lines]
We were friends, a long time ago. Laughin, rappin, chasin girls, obeying no laws, except the law of caring. Basketball days and high nights, no tomorrows, unable to remember yesterday. We live for today...
You guys think it's so funny because I want to be something besides a factory worker or a football player. Well, that's because you're a bunch of stupid niggers that don't know shit!
Y'all need to go to church!
Dorothy the only thing I know, is that your momma's a hoe!
If I ain't goin', nobody's goin.
